english_example_sentence: Even in these difficult times, we will hope for good things.
russian_example_sentence: Даже в эти трудные времена мы будем надеяться на хорошие вещи.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz, bu zor zamanlarda bile iyi şeyler umayacağız.
